DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide human lipidomics standard simvastatin treatment use comparison similar preclinical study .
DOC.brief_title: Lipid Biomarker Study Men With Dyslipidemia After Simvastatin Treatment ( Study MK-0000-140 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Participant Caucasian ( include Hispanic ) male Participant maximum waist size 40 inch Participant currently use lipidaltering medication Participant good health diagnosis dyslipidemia Participant stomach ulcer within last 3 month Participant heart attack last 6 month angina Participant chronic heart failure Participant history stroke , seizure , major neurological disorder Participant history cancer Participant gastrointestinal condition affect bowel movement Participant type 1 2 diabetes
